name: WEBmadman's 3d Image Gallery
description:
This is the first of a series of expeiments I did using Blend4web- the project seems to have stalled for now, so I'm exploring other development platforms, Armory3d looks promising...

You can navigate through this in the following ways-

  • keyboard- arrow keys to rotate.| W and S keys to zoom in/out
  • mouse- click and drag to rotate | Scroll wheel zoom
  • touch screen- touch and drag to rotate | Pinch zoom

There are more, but that will get you started- explore!

All the art is by me, WEBmadman, and is under the CC-BY-SA license.

The source blend file is here- http://sketchbin.webmadman.net/b4w/blender/nextobject2018.blend
